EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Ovation Select Cabin Management System from Honeywell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Give your cabin a face lift and retire your outdated cabin management system with Honeywell´s Ovation Select®.
The Ovation Select system offers business jet passengers a broad range of cabin entertainment, control and integrated communications to meet the demands of their busy schedules.
When you upgrade to Ovation Select, you'll be able to:
- Control lighting, temperature, shades, galley functions and audio/video from the convenience of your seat using wireless technology. - Connect to your entertainment system using Bluetooth technology by paring your headphones to the personal control unit (PCU). - Watch satellite TV or a high-definition Blu-ray movie on a 4k Ultra-high-definition television with full surround sound. - Review presentations, stream content and much more on touch-screen monitors from your mobile device or your hands-free iPad arms from anywhere in the cabin.
Learn more about Ovation Select with New United Goderich, Honeywell´s authorized dealer, serving the US and Canada for over 25 years, and upgrade today!.
